footer.brand_desc: Bringing the authentic taste of Madurai to Sweden. Experience culinary excellence in every bite.

founders.title: From Our Family to Yours
founders.description: Born from a longing for the authentic tastes of home, Taste of Madurai was founded to bring the vibrant culinary heritage of Tamil Nadu to Stockholm. Every dish we serve carries the legacy of our ancestors.
